__e: Eight German fighters or 80 German fighters, it still doesn't change what I think of you and your boys.
Germans didn't write any of this, did they?
Can I talk to those Germans?
I know the Germans lost the war.
The Germans have been shooting us for six years.
But as far as I remember, the Germans lost the war.
Last days for Germans. For me too, I think.
People say that you act with the Germans, and that's why,
For now the Germans are here and so are we.
The Germans are ahead of us.
Germans are like children who don't know freedom.
The Germans got to me before you did.
With the cold and the Germans taking everything, this is quite natural.
We must reach the German camp to tell them there is no water here!
The last time, do you know what I said? "I have nothing." And they said: "Oh, you have nothing?".
But the Jerries have heard of them, because these Yanks have been them the devil.
Sir, what do we do if the Germans show?
